properties.displayName: Deny KMS Keys Not Rotated Within 365 Days
properties.description: This policy denies the creation or update of KMS keys that have not been rotated within the last 365 days. Each key must have a tag 'LastRotationDate' (formatted as YYYY-MM-DD) that is on or after the specified cutoff date.
